## Feature Description
Provide a clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement.  
Examples:  
- New screen in a specific Feature module  
- New UseCase or Repository method  
- Improved SwiftUI navigation flow  
- Addition of new Core service (e.g., Keychain, Networking, Storage)

## Problem to Solve / Context
Explain the motivation behind the feature.  
What problem does it solve?  
Why does it matter to the user or the architecture?

## User Story
As a **<role>**,  
I want **<capability>**,  
so that **<benefit>**.

## Acceptance Criteria
Define clear conditions of satisfaction.  
- [ ] Given ...  
- [ ] When ...  
- [ ] Then ...

## Architecture / Module Impact
Does this affect a specific feature?  
Example:  
- Feature/Auth â†’ Presentation / Domain / Data  
- Core/Network  
- App Navigation  
- DI container

Specify expected changes in:  
- SwiftUI views  
- ViewModels  
- UseCases  
- Repositories  
- Remote/Local Data Sources  

## UI/UX Impact
Does this require new SwiftUI components, layouts, or navigation transitions?

## Additional Context
Add mockups, notes, API endpoints, diagrams, or related discussions.
